title: Volatile Organic Chemicals Activate TRPA1 Receptor to Induce Sensory Pulmonary Irritation
short_name: TRPA1 activation leads to pulmonary sensory irritation

aop_kes.event: Opening of calcium channel, Calcium influx
SP (Substance P) release, Local increase of SP
Increased CGRP, neuronal release of CGRP
Increased neurokinin A (NKA) by neuronal cells

aop_aos.event: Trigeminal and/or vagal nerve excitation causes Airway Hyper-responsiveness,Cough, Dyspnea
Irritation of nasal mucosa inducing sneeze reflex
Increased Respiratory irritability and Chronic Cough,
